name: The Foretold: Exordium
description:
Inspired by the works of classic gothic horror from H.P. Lovecraft, Stephen King, and Mary Shelley, dive into a partially cozy, gothic horror adventure set against the backdrop of Ancient Egypt.

Play as Herbert Westmark, a man with a keen interest in and history with the paranormal, as he battles his way through monsters and ancient entities.

Equip items and relics, acquire cards, and master the gameboard, but be careful how you battle and play your cards. One misstep can cost you dearly.

Key Features
  • Explore the branching roads along the world map that hold random loot, encounters and surprises.
  • Dive into a deep fully voiced narrative with interesting characters.
  • Persona Points allow you to level up Herbert's various skills.
  • Skill Checks will allow to test your character build.
  • Hone your deck against the dark corrupted things.



As you progress, gather items to bolster your arsenal against upcoming adversaries and enhance your Persona to improve your chances of making it through.

Delve further into the depths using tabletop-style skill assessments to uncover additional insights, but remain mindful of the potential consequences if your efforts fall short.
